channel.title: AI Change Watcher (All)
channel.description: All detected text changes (may include noise). Verify on official sources.

item.title: [Medium] OpenAI News (RSS)
item.description:
Detected a text change. Please verify on the official page.
Diff (excerpt): - <lastBuildDate>Mon, 26 Jan 2026 03:02:38 GMT</lastBuildDate> + <lastBuildDate>Mon, 26 Jan 2026 03:53:02 GMT</lastBuildDate>

item.title: [High] Test Source (Repo file)
item.description:
Summary (JA, 3 lines): 「Test Source (Repo file)」に新たに「TEST_CHANGE_1」 という内容が追加された可能性がありそうです。 変更の詳細や影響範囲は差分からは不明のようです。
Please verify on the official page. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/h-sim/ai-change-watcher/main/test_source.txt
Diff (excerpt): +TEST_CHANGE_1
